_quickTake.js.title: Quick Take
_quickTake.js.content:
import { strict as assert } from "assert"; import { patcher } from "html-table-patcher"; assert.equal( patcher( ` {% if customer.details.hasAccount %} {% else %} {% endif %}
variation #1
variation #2
` ).result, `
{% if customer.details.hasAccount %}
variation #1
{% else %}
variation #2
{% endif %}
` );
